content.rendered:
The New Gym

About The New Gym
About us

The New Gym is the lowest cost 24/7 gym chain with multiple locations nationwide. Our mission is to break down barriers to health for everyone in Vietnam, providing a gym system with high quality, affordable and flexible training equipment for all. everyone – GYM FOR EVERYONE.
